title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When invoking the New Java Package feature, there is a message displayed at the top that says 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists', even when the package name field is empty.
EB: The message displayed at the top should only appear when a package name is entered, and if a folder with the same name already exists.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the New Package Wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Observe the message at the top that indicates the folder already exists.
